means: 惧内( henpeck的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: People refer the man who was afraid of his wife as henpecked.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们把那个怕老婆的男人叫“妻管严”.

sentence.Network_en: When they returned home, Tun - weng said, " Our Eldest must certainly be henpecked.
sentence.Network_cn: 回家之后, 遯 翁道: “ 老大准怕老婆.

sentence.Network_en: Among Chinese philosophers, Wang Yang - ming was henpecked. "
sentence.Network_cn: 中国哲学家里, 王阳明是怕老婆的. ”

list.abs: Jack is the most henpecked man I know .杰克是我所认识人中最怕老婆的人。
9 see joke : have a henpecked person , wife died .9看笑话：有个怕老婆的人，老婆死了。
A henpecked husband always gives in to his wife ., 妻管严丈夫总是屈服于妻子.
英语 -... ... hen party (只有女人的嘈杂集会) henpecked husband (怕老婆的丈夫) She’s a good chick. (她是个好女人。).

entry.def: You use hen-pecked to describe a man when you disapprove of the fact that his wife, or another woman, is always telling him what to do or telling him that he has done something wrong.
